message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60% and you can take 40%
I think we can both do better than that.  Let's try a 60/40 split, but in my favor this time.  It's a fair chance for both of us to get a better deal than the last round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. 55/45 split seems fair to me.
